santamhākam sikkhāpadāni gihi gatāni
gihinaḥ api jānanti

original: ‘idaṁ vo samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtiyānaṁ kappati, idaṁ vo na kappatī’ti.
analyzed: idam vaḥ samaṇānam sakyaputtiyānam kappati idam vaḥ na kappati iti

original: Sace mayaṁ khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanissāma, bhavissanti vattāro—
analyzed: sace mayam khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanissāma bhavissanti vattāraḥ
dhūmakālikam samaṇena gotamena sāvakānam sikkhāpadam paññatta

original: Yāvimesaṁ satthā aṭṭhāsi tāvime sikkhāpadesu sikkhiṁsu.
analyzed: yau imesam satthā aṭṭhāsi tau ime sikkhāpadesu sikkhisu

original: Yato imesaṁ satthā parinibbuto, na dānime sikkhāpadesu sikkhantī’ti.
analyzed: yatas imesam satthā parinibbutaḥ na dāni ime sikkhāpadesu sikkhanti iti

original: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho apaññattaṁ nappaññapeyya, paññattaṁ na samucchindeyya, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vatteyya.
analyzed: yadi saṅghassa pattakalla saṅghaḥ a paññattam na paññapeyya paññattam na samucchindeyya yathā paññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vatteyya
esā ñatti
suṇātu me āvuso saṅghaḥ
santamhākam sikkhāpadāni gihi gatāni
gihinaḥ api jānanti

original: ‘idaṁ vo samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtiyānaṁ kappati, idaṁ vo na kappatī’ti.
analyzed: idam vaḥ samaṇānam sakyaputtiyānam kappati idam vaḥ na kappati iti

original: Sace mayaṁ khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanissāma, bhavissanti vattāro—
analyzed: sace mayam khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanissāma bhavissanti vattāraḥ
dhūmakālikam samaṇena gotamena sāvakānam sikkhāpadam paññatta

original: Yāvimesaṁ satthā aṭṭhāsi tāvime sikkhāpadesu sikkhiṁsu.
analyzed: yau imesam satthā aṭṭhāsi tau ime sikkhāpadesu sikkhisu

original: Yato imesaṁ satthā parinibbuto, na dānime sikkhāpadesu sikkhantī’ti.
analyzed: yatas imesam satthā parinibbutaḥ na dāni ime sikkhāpadesu sikkhanti iti

original: Saṅgho apaññattaṁ nappaññapeti, paññattaṁ na samucchindati, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattati.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ a paññattam na paññapeti paññattam na samucchindati yathā paññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattati

original: Yassāyasmato khamati apaññattassa appaññāpanā, paññattassa asamucchedo, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattanā, so tuṇhassa;
analyzed: yassa ayasmataḥ khamati a paññattassa ap paññāpanā paññattassa a samucchedaḥ yathā paññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattanā saḥ tuṇhassa
yassa na khamati saḥ bhāseyya

original: Saṅgho apaññattaṁ nappaññapeti, paññattaṁ na samucchindati, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattati.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ a paññattam na paññapeti paññattam na samucchindati yathā paññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattati

original: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī”ti.
analyzed: khamati saṅghassa tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Atha kho therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: atha kho therāḥ bhikkhū āyasmantam ānandam etat avocuḥ

original: “idaṁ te, āvuso ānanda, dukkaṭaṁ, yaṁ tvaṁ bhagavantaṁ na pucchi—‘katamāni pana, bhante, khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī’ti.
analyzed: idam te āvuso ānanda dukkaṭa yam tvam bhagavantam na pucchikatamāni pana bhante khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni iti
desehi tam dukkaṭanti

original: “Ahaṁ kho, bhante, assatiyā bhagavantaṁ na pucchiṁ—‘katamāni pana, bhante, khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī’ti.
analyzed: aham kho bhante assatiyā bhagavantam na pucchikatamāni pana bhante khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni iti

original: Nāhaṁ taṁ dukkaṭaṁ passāmi, api cāyasmantānaṁ saddhāya desemi taṁ dukkaṭan”ti.
analyzed: na aham tam dukkaṭam passāmi api ca āyasmantānam saddhāya desemi tam dukkaṭam ti

original: “Idampi te, āvuso ānanda, dukkaṭaṁ, yaṁ tvaṁ bhagavato vassikasāṭikaṁ akkamitvā sibbesi.
analyzed: idam api te āvuso ānanda dukkaṭa yam tvam bhagavataḥ vassika sāṭikam akkamitvā sibbesi
desehi tam dukkaṭanti

original: “Ahaṁ kho, bhante, na agāravena bhagavato vassikasāṭikaṁ akkamitvā sibbesiṁ.
analyzed: aham kho bhante na agāravena bhagavataḥ vassika sāṭikam akkamitvā sibbesi

original: Nāhaṁ taṁ dukkaṭaṁ passāmi, api cāyasmantānaṁ saddhāya desemi taṁ dukkaṭan”ti.
analyzed: na aham tam dukkaṭam passāmi api ca āyasmantānam saddhāya desemi tam dukkaṭam ti

original: “Idampi te, āvuso ānanda, dukkaṭaṁ, yaṁ tvaṁ mātugāmehi bhagavato sarīraṁ paṭhamaṁ vandāpesi, tāsaṁ rodantīnaṁ bhagavato sarīraṁ assukena makkhitaṁ.
analyzed: idam pi te āvuso ānanda dukkaṭa yam tvam mātugāmehi bhagavataḥ sarīram paṭhamam vandāpesi tāsam rodantīnam bhagavataḥ sarīram assukena makkhita
desehi tam dukkaṭanti

original: “Ahaṁ kho, bhante—māyimāsaṁ vikāle ahesunti—mātugāmehi bhagavato sarīraṁ paṭhamaṁ vandāpesiṁ.
analyzed: aham kho bhante imāyi māsam vikāle ahesunti mātugāmehi bhagavato sarīram paṭhamam vandāpesi

original: Nāhaṁ taṁ dukkaṭaṁ passāmi, api cāyasmantānaṁ saddhāya desemi taṁ dukkaṭan”ti.
analyzed: na aham tam dukkaṭam passāmi api ca āyasmantānam saddhāya desemi tam dukkaṭam ti

original: “Idampi te, āvuso ānanda, dukkaṭaṁ, yaṁ tvaṁ bhagavatā oḷārike nimitte kayiramāne, oḷārike obhāse kayiramāne, na bhagavantaṁ yāci—
analyzed: idam api te āvuso ānanda dukkaṭa yam tvam bhagavatā oḷārike nimitte kayiramāne oḷārike obhāse kayiramāne na bhagavantam yāci

original: ‘tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappaṁ, tiṭṭhatu sugato kappaṁ, bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan’ti.
analyzed: tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa tiṭṭhatu sugataḥ kappa bahu jana hitāya bahu jana sukhāya loka anukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya deva manussānam ti
desehi tam dukkaṭanti

original: “Ahaṁ kho, bhante, mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto na bhagavantaṁ yāciṁ—
analyzed: aham kho bhante mārena pariyuṭṭhita cittaḥ na bhagavantam yāci

original: ‘tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappaṁ, tiṭṭhatu sugato kappaṁ, bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan’ti.
analyzed: tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa tiṭṭhatu sugataḥ kappa bahu jana hitāya bahu jana sukhāya loka anukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya deva manussānam ti

original: Nāhaṁ taṁ dukkaṭaṁ passāmi, api cāyasmantānaṁ saddhāya desemi taṁ dukkaṭan”ti.
analyzed: na aham tam dukkaṭam passāmi api ca āyasmantānam saddhāya desemi tam dukkaṭam ti

original: “Idampi te, āvuso ānanda, dukkaṭaṁ yaṁ tvaṁ mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye pabbajjaṁ ussukkaṁ akāsi.
analyzed: idam pi te āvuso ānanda dukkaṭam yam tvam mātugāmassa tathāgata ppavedite dhamma vinaye pabbajjam ussukkam akāsi
desehi tam dukkaṭanti

original: “Ahaṁ kho, bhante, ayaṁ mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavato mātucchā āpādikā posikā khīrassa
analyzed: aham kho bhante ayam mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavataḥ mātucchā āpādikā posikā khīrassa

original: dāyikā bhagavantaṁ janettiyā kālaṅkatāya thaññaṁ pāyesīti mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite
analyzed: dāyikā bhagavantam janettiyā kālaṅkatāya thaññam pāyesi iti mātugāmassa tathāgata ppavedite
dhammavinaye pabbajjam ussukkam akāsi

original: Nāhaṁ taṁ dukkaṭaṁ passāmi, api cāyasmantānaṁ saddhāya desemi taṁ dukkaṭan”ti.
analyzed: na aham tam dukkaṭam passāmi api ca āyasmantānam saddhāya desemi tam dukkaṭam ti

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā purāṇo dakkhiṇāgirismiṁ cārikaṁ carati mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā purāṇaḥ dakkhiṇāgirismim cārikam carati mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim pañcamattehi bhikkhu satehi

original: Atha kho āyasmā purāṇo therehi bhikkhūhi dhamme ca vinaye ca saṅgīte dakkhiṇāgirismiṁ
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā purāṇaḥ therehi bhikkhūhi dhamme ca vinaye ca saṅgīte dakkhiṇāgirismi

original: yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena rājagahaṁ yena veḷuvanaṁ kalandakanivāpo yena therā
analyzed: yathābhirantam viharitvā yena rājagaham yena veḷuvanam kalandakanivāpaḥ yena therā

original: bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā therehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammoditvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: bhikkhū tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā therehi bhikkhūhi saddhim paṭisammoditvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ purāṇaṁ therā bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam kho āyasmantam purāṇam therāḥ bhikkhū etat avocuḥ

original: “therehi, āvuso purāṇa, dhammo ca vinayo ca saṅgīto.
analyzed: therehi āvuso purāṇa dhammo ca vinayo ca saṅgīto
upehi tam
susaṅgīta avuso therehi dhammo ca vinayo ca

original: Api ca yatheva mayā bhagavato sammukhā sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ, tathevāhaṁ dhāressāmī”ti.
analyzed: api ca yathā iva mayā bhagavato sammukhā suta sammukhā paṭiggahita tathā iva aham dhāressāmi iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando there bhikkhū etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho āyasman ānandaḥ there bhikkhū etat avoca
bhagavā ma bhante parinibbāna kāle evam āha

original: ‘tena hānanda, saṅgho mamaccayena channassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍaṁ āṇāpetū’”ti.
analyzed: tena ha ānanda saṅghaḥ mamaccayena channassa bhikkhunaḥ brahmadaṇḍam āṇāpetu uti
pucchi pana tvaḥ āvuso ānanda bhagavanta
katamaḥ pana bhante brahmadaṇḍā iti
pucchim kho ha bhante bhagavanta
katamaḥ pana bhante brahmadaṇḍā iti

original: ‘Channo, ānanda, bhikkhu yaṁ iccheyya taṁ vadeyya.
analyzed: channaḥ ānanda bhikkhu yam iccheyya tam vadeyya

original: Bhikkhūhi channo bhikkhu neva vattabbo, na ovaditabbo, nānusāsitabbo’”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhūhi channaḥ bhikkhu na iva vattabbaḥ na ovaditabbaḥ na anusāsitabbaḥ ti

original: “Tena hāvuso ānanda, tvaṁyeva channassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍaṁ āṇāpehī”ti.
analyzed: tena ha āvuso ānanda tvayā iva channassa bhikkhunaḥ brahmadaṇḍam āṇāpehi iti

original: “Kathāhaṁ, bhante, channassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍaṁ āṇāpemi, caṇḍo so bhikkhu pharuso”ti?
analyzed: kathā aha bhante channassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍam āṇāpemi caṇḍaḥ saḥ bhikkhu pharusaḥ ti

original: “Tena hāvuso ānanda, bahukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ gacchāhī”ti.
analyzed: tena ha āvuso ānanda bahukehi bhikkhūhi saddhim gacchāhi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭissutvā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmat ānandaḥ therānam bhikkhūnam paṭissutvā mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena

original: saddhiṁ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi nāvāya ujjavanikāya kosambiṁ ujjavi, nāvāya paccorohitvā
analyzed: saddhim pañcamattehi bhikkhu satehi nāvāya ujjavanikāya kosambim ujjavi nāvāya paccorohitvā

original: rañño udenassa uyyānassa avidūre aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
analyzed: raññaḥ udenassa uyyānassa avidūre aññatarasmim rukkha mūle nisīdi

original: Tena kho pana samayena rājā udeno uyyāne paricāresi saddhiṁ orodhena.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena rājā udenaḥ uyyāne paricāresi saddhim orodhena
assosi kho raññaḥ udenassa orodhaḥ

original: “amhākaṁ kira ācariyo ayyo ānando uyyānassa avidūre aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisinno”ti.
analyzed: amhākam kira ācariyaḥ ayyaḥ ānandaḥ uyyānassa avidūre aññatarasmim rukkha mūle nisinno ti

original: Atha kho rañño udenassa orodho rājānaṁ udenaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho raññaḥ udenassa orodhaḥ rājānam udenam etat avoca

original: “amhākaṁ kira, deva, ācariyo ayyo ānando uyyānassa avidūre aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisinno.
analyzed: amhākam kira devaḥ ācariyaḥ ayyaḥ ānandaḥ uyyānassa avidūre aññatarasmim rukkha mūle nisinno

original: Icchāma mayaṁ, deva, ayyaṁ ānandaṁ passitun”ti.
analyzed: icchāma maya deva ayyam ānandam passitunti
tena hi tumhe samaṇam ānandam passatha ati

original: Atha kho rañño udenassa orodho yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho raññaḥ udenassa orodhaḥ yena āyasmantaḥ ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam ānandam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho rañño udenassa orodhaṁ āyasmā ānando dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam kho raññaḥ udenassa orodham āyasmā ānandaḥ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Atha kho rañño udenassa orodho āyasmatā ānandena dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito āyasmato ānandassa pañca uttarāsaṅgasatāni pādāsi.
analyzed: atha kho raññaḥ udenassa orodhaḥ āyasmatā ānandena dhammiyā kathāya sandassitaḥ samādapitaḥ samuttejitaḥ sampahasitaḥ āyasmataḥ ānandassa pañca uttarāsaṅga satāni

original: Atha kho rañño udenassa orodho āyasmato ānandassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena rājā udeno tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha kho raññaḥ udenassa orodhaḥ āyasmataḥ ānandassa bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā āyasmantam ānandam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā yena rājā udeno tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasā kho rājā udeno orodhaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
analyzed: addasā khalu rājā udenaḥ orodham dūratas uva āgacchanta
disvānaḥ orodham etat avoca

original: “api nu kho tumhe samaṇaṁ ānandaṁ passitthā”ti?
analyzed: api nu kho tumhe samaṇam ānandam passittha ati
apassimhā kho maya deva ayyam ānandanti

original: “Api nu tumhe samaṇassa ānandassa kiñci adatthā”ti?
analyzed: api nu tumhe samaṇassa ānandassa kiñci adattha ati

original: “Adamhā kho mayaṁ, deva, ayyassa ānandassa pañca uttarāsaṅgasatānī”ti.
analyzed: kho maya deva ayyassa ānandassa pañca uttarāsaṅga satāni iti
rājā udenaḥ ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāca iti

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇo ānando tāva bahuṁ cīvaraṁ paṭiggahessati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇaḥ ānandaḥ tāva bahum cīvaram paṭiggahessati

original: Dussavāṇijjaṁ vā samaṇo ānando karissati, paggāhikasālaṁ vā pasāressatī”ti.
analyzed: dussavāṇijjam vā samaṇaḥ ānandaḥ karissati paggāhika sālam vā pasāressati iti

original: Atha kho rājā udeno yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: atha khalu rājā udenaḥ yena āyasmai ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho rājā udeno āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu rājā udenaḥ āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “āgamā nu khvidha, bho ānanda, amhākaṁ orodho”ti?
analyzed: nu khvidha bho ānanda amhākam orodhā uti
āgamāsi khalu te idha mahā rāja
api pana bhoto ānandassa kiñci adāsi iti
adāsi khalu me mahā rāja pañca uttarāsaṅga satāni iti

original: “Kiṁ pana bhavaṁ ānando tāva bahuṁ cīvaraṁ karissatī”ti?
analyzed: kim pana bhavan ānandaḥ tāva bahum cīvaram karissati iti

original: “Ye te, mahārāja, bhikkhū dubbalacīvarā tehi saddhiṁ saṁvibhajissāmī”ti.
analyzed: ye te mahā rāja bhikkhū dubbala cīvarā tehi saddhim savibhajissāmi iti

original: “Yāni kho pana, bho ānanda, porāṇakāni dubbalacīvarāni tāni kathaṁ karissathā”ti?
analyzed: yāni kha pana bho ānanda porāṇakāni dubbala cīvarāni tāni katham karissatha iti
tāni mahā rāja uttarattharaṇam karissāma ati

original: “Yāni pana, bho ānanda, porāṇakāni uttarattharaṇāni tāni kathaṁ karissathā”ti?
analyzed: yāni pana bho ānanda porāṇakāni uttarattharaṇāni tāni katham karissatha ati
tāni mahā rāja bhisi chaviyaḥ karissāma ati

original: “Yā pana, bho ānanda, porāṇakā bhisicchaviyo tā kathaṁ karissathā”ti?
analyzed: yāḥ pana bho ānanda porāṇakāḥ bhisicchaviyaḥ tāḥ katham karissatha ati
tāḥ mahā rāja bhūmattharaṇam karissāma ati

original: “Yāni pana, bho ānanda, porāṇakāni bhūmattharaṇāni tāni kathaṁ karissathā”ti?
analyzed: yāni pana bho ānanda porāṇakāni bhūmattharaṇāni tāni katham karissatha ati
tāni mahā rāja pāda puñchaniyaḥ karissāma ati

original: “Yā pana, bho ānanda, porāṇakā pādapuñchaniyo tā kathaṁ karissathā”ti?
analyzed: yāḥ pana bho ānanda porāṇakāḥ pāda puñchaniyaḥ tāḥ katham karissatha ati
tāḥ mahā rāja rajaḥ haraṇam karissāma ati

original: “Yāni pana, bho ānanda, porāṇakāni rajoharaṇāni tāni kathaṁ karissathā”ti?
analyzed: yāni pana bho ānanda porāṇakāni rajaḥ haraṇāni tāni katham karissatha iti

original: “Tāni, mahārāja, koṭṭetvā cikkhallena madditvā paribhaṇḍaṁ limpissāmā”ti.
analyzed: tāni mahā rāja koṭṭetvā cikkhallena madditvā paribhaṇḍam limpissāma ati

original: Atha kho rājā udeno—“sabbevime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā yoniso upanenti, na kulavaṁ gamentī”ti—
analyzed: atha kho rājā samaṇā sakyaputtiyāḥ yonisas upanenti na kulavam gamenti iti

original: āyasmato ānandassa aññānipi pañca dussasatāni pādāsi.
analyzed: āyasmataḥ ānandassa aññāni pi pañca dussa satāni

original: Ayañcarahi āyasmato ānandassa paṭhamaṁ cīvarabhikkhā uppajji cīvarasahassaṁ.
analyzed: ayam carahi āyasmataḥ ānandassa paṭhamam cīvara bhikkhā uppajji cīvara sahassa

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena ghositārāmo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ yena ghositārāmo tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Atha kho āyasmā channo yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmā channaḥ yena āyasmai ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam ānandam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ channaṁ āyasmā ānando etadavoca—
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam kho āyasmantam channam āyasmai ānandaḥ etat avoca
saṅghena te āvuso channa brahmadaṇḍaḥ āṇāpitaḥ iti
katamaḥ pana bhante ānanda brahmadaṇḍaḥ āṇāpito ti

original: “Tvaṁ, āvuso channa, bhikkhū yaṁ iccheyyāsi taṁ vadeyyāsi.
analyzed: tvam āvuso channa bhikkhū yam iccheyyāsi tam vadeyyāsi

original: Bhikkhūhi tvaṁ neva vattabbo, na ovaditabbo, nānusāsitabbo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhūhi tvam na iva vattabbaḥ na ovaditabbaḥ na anusāsitabbaḥ ti

original: “Nanvāhaṁ, bhante ānanda, hato ettāvatā, yatohaṁ bhikkhūhi neva vattabbo, na ovaditabbo, nānusāsitabbo”ti tattheva mucchito papato.
analyzed: nanu āha bhante ānanda hataḥ ettāvatā yatas ham bhikkhūhi na iva vattabbaḥ na ovaditabbaḥ na anusāsitabbaḥ iti tattha iva mucchitaḥ papato

original: Atha kho āyasmā channo brahmadaṇḍena aṭṭīyamāno harāyamāno jigucchamāno eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā channaḥ brahmadaṇḍena aṭṭīyamānaḥ harāyamānaḥ jigucchamānaḥ ekaḥ vūpakaṭṭhaḥ appamattaḥ ātāpī pahitattaḥ viharantaḥ nacirassa iva

original: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṁ—
analyzed: yassa atthāya kula puttā sammat eva agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajanti tat anuttara

original: brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
analyzed: brahmacariya pariyosānam diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi

original: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
analyzed: vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati

original: Aññataro ca panāyasmā channo arahataṁ ahosi.
analyzed: aññataro ca pana ayasmā channo arahatam ahosi

original: Atha kho āyasmā channo arahattaṁ patto yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā channaḥ arahattam pattaḥ yena āyasmai ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca
paṭippassambhehi dāni me bhante ānanda brahmadaṇḍanti

original: “Yadaggena tayā, āvuso channa, arahattaṁ sacchikataṁ tadaggena te brahmadaṇḍo paṭippassaddho”ti.
analyzed: yadaggena tayā āvuso channa arahattam sacchikatam tadaggena te brahmadaṇḍaḥ paṭippassaddho ti

original: Imāya kho pana vinayasaṅgītiyā pañca bhikkhusatāni anūnāni anadhikāni ahesuṁ.
analyzed: imāya kho pana vinaya saṅgītiyā pañca bhikkhu satāni anūnāni anadhikāni ahesu
tasmai ayam vinaya saṅgī iti pañcasatikā ati vuccati iti

original: Pañcasatikakkhandhako ekādasamo. Imamhi khandhake vatthū tevīsati.
analyzed: pañcasatika khandhakaḥ ekādasamaḥ imamhi khandhake vatthū tevīsati
tassa uddāna
parinibbute sambuddhe
thero kassapasavhayo
āmantayi bhikkhu gaṇa
saddhamma manupālakaḥ
pāvāyat hāna maggamhi
su bhaddena
saṅgāyissāma saddhamma
adhammaḥ pure dippati
eka inūna pañca sata
ānandampi ca uccini
dhamma vinaya saṅgīti
vasantaḥ guhamuttame
upālim vinayam pucchi
piṭakam tīṇi
akasu jinasāvakā
khudda anukhuddake nānā
yathā paññatti vattanā
na pucchi akkamitvāna
na yāci ca
pabbajjam mātu gāmassa
saddhāya dukkaṭāni me
purāṇaḥ brahmadaṇḍañca
orodhaḥ udenena saha
tāva bahu dubbalañca
uttarattharaṇā bhisi
bhūmattharaṇā puñchaniyaḥ
rajaḥ cikkhalla maddanā
sahassa cīvaram uppajji
tad jitaḥ brahmadaṇḍena
catussaccam apāpuṇi
vasībhūtā pañca satā
tasmai pañcasatī iti
pañcasatika khandhakaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ
